New Records: Pathum Nissanka completed the seventh fifty of his T20I career
Key Match Events: Pakistan's bowlers had an even better powerplay than Sri Lanka's, thanks largely to Mohammad Hasnain and Haris Rauf who picked up three early wickets
Hasaranga's googly dominates the middle overs
Rajapaksa hit a couple of sixes off Usman Qadir early in the middle overs to get Sri Lanka well ahead of the required rate
Babar Azam was cleaned up for a 29-ball 30
Pakistan lost their last nine wickets for 58 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Hasaranga, Nissanka star as Sri Lanka tune up for final with win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yes, it was another chasing side winning in Dubai, the venue now having seen 17 victories for chasing sides in the last 20 T20Is
Sri Lanka control the early overs
Hasnain and Rauf rip out three wickets
